plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I wear green, but have no sleeves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I often live outside.
☀️ I need the sun.
💧 I drink water.

plant.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🧡 I am a root vegetable.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when it gets hot. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a yellow plant.
🍿 I taste good with butter and salt.
🎬 You hear me during a movie.

plant.question: I have a stem, petals, and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I come in many colors.
🌸 You can give me as a gift.
🐝 I help bees make honey.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. Pickles are made from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am good in salads.
🌿 I need a trellis to grow upwards.
🧂 I am preserved in vinegar and salt.

plant.question: I have a rough bark, rings inside, and lose my leaves in the fall. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 I provide shade in the summer.
🪵 My wood can be used to build houses.
🐿️ Squirrels often live in me.

plant.question: I'm a type of plant that looks like hair on the ground. People love to walk barefoot on me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ You can play soccer on me.
🏡 People have me in their yards.
💦 I need to be watered regularly.

plant.question: I am a tropical fruit with a tough, spiky outside and sweet, juicy inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🍍 I grow on a plant, not a tree.
🍕 I am NOT a popular pizza topping.
🍹 I am often in tropical drinks.

plant.question: I'm a plant with a sticky sap and leaves that can be used to make a sweet treat. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 I have a distinctive leaf shape.
🥞 My sap is used to make syrup that tastes great on pancakes.
🇨🇦 I am a national symbol of Canada.

plant.question: I'm a plant that is often grown in deserts and has sharp needles. I can store water for a long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I am often found in hot, dry climates.
🏜️ Some types of me can grow very tall.
💧 I am adapted to survive with very little water.

food.question: I am yellow and curved, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A popular snack for primates.
💛 My skin is often discarded.
☀️ I grow on trees in warm places.

food.question: I am round and juicy, and I come in many colors, like red, green, or yellow. You can eat me as a snack or make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow on trees.
🥧 I am often used in pies.
🍎 A very common fruit

food.question: I am white and fluffy, and I come from a hen. You can fry me, scramble me, or bake me into a cake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐔 Laid by a bird.
🍳 Often eaten for breakfast.
🥚 I am oval shaped.

food.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🧡 My color is in my name.
✨ Good for your eyesight.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from a cow. You can pour me on your cereal or drink me by myself. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Sometimes flavored with chocolate.
🐄 Makes your bones strong.
🥣 I am often poured on breakfast foods.

food.question: I am made from wheat and baked in an oven. You can spread butter or jam on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food.
🥪 I am used to make sandwiches.
🌾 The main ingredient to create me are grown in fields.

food.question: I am a vegetable that makes you cry when you chop me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have many layers.
😭 I can make your eyes water.
🍕 I am often put on pizza.

food.question: I am a frozen treat that comes in many flavors. I'm often served in a cone or a cup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a very popular dessert.
🥶 I'm very cold.
🌈 There are many different flavors and colors.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have tiny black seeds.
🌏 I come from New Zealand.
🇨🇳 Although I originate in China.

food.question: I am a small, round vegetable that is often green and sometimes purple. I grow in clusters on a stalk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I look like tiny trees.
💪 I am very healthy.
🥗 Often eaten raw in salads.
